net.rubyeye.xmemcached
Interface XMemcachedClientMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMemcachedClient
public interface XMemcachedClientMBean

XMemcachedClientMBean.It is used for JMX to add/remove memcached server.

Author:
dennis
